PROMO.MAIN_TEXT: FXCH introduces a novel method for Spot-FX clearing, focusing on simplicity in settlement technology. Our aim is to streamline the trade clearing process, eliminating unnecessary steps and associated costs.

TEXT.TEXT_1: We let our members quickly combine their trades and give them the chance to trade more with less money. This makes trading bigger and easier.
TEXT.TEXT_2: We make trading safer and cheaper for our members by handling trades in a way that lowers risks and the need for extra cash. Our methods ensure trades are smooth and secure.
TEXT.TEXT_3: We keep trading safe with a plan and a safety fund for times when someone can't pay. This spreads out the risk, keeping our trading environment stable and reliable for everyone.

TECHNOLOGY.START_TITLE: Trading digital assets is risky and complex
TECHNOLOGY.START_TEXT: Trading digital assets is risky and complex for institutions without centralized risk and settlement management.
TECHNOLOGY.END_TEXT: FXCH centralizes trading by managing risks and streamlining settlements, making it safer and simpler. It's also working on meeting regulatory standards to increase trust.

HORIZONTAL_TEXT: How Can I Simplify Trading with Blockchain and Streamline FX Clearing?

BENEFITS.TEXT_2: It's recorded on a digital ledger, proving your ownership.
BENEFITS.TEXT_3: Check and manage your balance anytime with digital keys.

TEAM.TITLE: Our team
TEAM.TEXT: A dynamic group of clearing, technology & sell-side industry veterans

POST_1.TITLE: Self-insurance risk and the demise of FXCM
POST_1.TEXT: Many pundits will offer their views on the reasons of FXCM's unfortunate fate. Focus will incorrectly point to market abuse, misleading customers and despicable FX desk practices.
